titles.title: I Know Whom I Have Believed

authors.author: James McGranahan Major Daniel W. Whittle

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: But "I know whom I have believed, newline And am persuaded that He is able newline To keep that which I've committed, newline Unto Him against that day."

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I know not why God's wondrous grace newline To me He hath made known; newline Nor why, unworthy, Christ in love newline Redeemed me for His own.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I know not how this saving faith newline To me He did impart, newline Nor how believing in His word newline Wrought peace within my heart.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I know not how the Spirit moves, newline Convincing men of sin, newline Revealing Jesus through the Word, newline Creating faith in Him.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I know not what of good or ill newline May be reserved for me. newline Of weary ways or golden days, newline Before His face I see.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I know not when my Lord may come, newline At night or noonday fair, newline Nor if I'll walk the vale with Him, newline Or meet Him in the air.
